Exception is thrown when removing an User Property or a Named Expression[00]
Build number:
2.2.0.v20070130-0630
Steps to reproduce:
1.insert a label and input "actuate"
2.switch to User Properties or Named Expressions,click Add
3.new an User Properties:Property Name:version
                         Property Type:float
4.select it then click remove,exception is thrown
Expected result:
The User Properties can be removed
Actual result:
Exception is thrown
